## sdApps

The sdApps package is a collection of applications supporting the surveydown package.

## Dashboard

Call `sdApps::sd_dashboard()` to launch the dashboard.

The **surveydown Dashboard** is a Shiny application that provides a user-friendly interface for managing and analyzing survey data. It allows users to upload survey data, perform various analyses, and visualize results in an interactive manner.

## Studio

Call `sdApps::sd_studio()` to launch the studio.

The **surveydown Studio** is a Shiny application that provides a GUI for creating and managing survey projects.
